website_summaries.verdict: A well-crafted memory foam mattress that can compete with products four times its cost.
pros: 12 inches of foam provide ultimate firm support
Offers a cool and comfortable night's sleep
cons: Little support around the edges of the bed

customer_reviews.title: Review after 2 years + a trick we learned!
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 2 years and LOVE IT! We DID wonder WHY there was a hump in the middle that just didn't seem to go away, and today I decided to find out why, and lifted it to flip up, and discovered that it CAME WITH TWO PILLOWS WE NEVER KNEW WERE THERE!! They had partially expanded, and were causing the hump! Other than that, we love the firmness, and have witnesses NO CHANGE in the mattress after having owned it for two years. It keeps ius cool at night, and was the ONLY way I could get comfortable when I broke a few ribs riding a bike earlier this year. Love it and would absolutely purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Krazy Pages

customer_reviews.title: loved it at first but now 2018 it is KILLING ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2016..loved it at first but now 2018 it is KILLING our backs...I think it got to soft..In addition where we lay the mattress sags and there is a hump in the middle we weigh 130 and 165..so this is not the issue...so disappointed ..I have emailed company..but I would say save your $$ and just buy a top of the line mattress..this might be ok to use sometimes in a rv or guest room but for full time sleeping will not hold up!
customer_reviews.author: GypsyChick

customer_reviews.title: Went from great to bad to utter crap fast
customer_reviews.text: We were initially very pleased with this mattress that was as firm as advertised . However, after just 1 year of use, the "memory" foam has a bad memory all its own. It has hills and valleys throughout and it is now worse than the old mattress we replaced. Tried contacting the company but only voice mail with no call back after repeated requests. The web site they refer you to is non-existent. Not sure if they still have product for sale anywhere but if so, don't waste your money. And finally was contacted by the mfg after Amazon got involved. And they went from bad to completely crappy. A bad mattress from a more than bad company.
customer_reviews.author: Fork Road

customer_reviews.title: Quality change NOT FIRM
customer_reviews.text: I first purchase a mattress back in 2015 which we love and it is still firm to this day. I began recommending this mattress to my family. So my aunt asked me to purchase the same mattress for her. The mattress arrived and we quickly realized that it is not firm and the quality is no longer the same. The company now seems to use CHEAP materials. On top of that they have poor Custmer service. They never responded to any of my inquiry and wanted me to pay to ship the mattress back for a refund. DO NOT BUY FROM DYNASTY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: i would not buy again sunk in some areas over time. not soft. i bought it in 2015. my wife and i are already in the market for a new mattress. i was hoping to get my ten years out of this guy but am let down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon addict

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep ever!
customer_reviews.text: Our only regret is not buying this mattress sooner! After sleeping for 2 years on the cheap mattress that came with our 5th wheel (we full time) my husband and I woke up every day in pain. We have had this mattress for 2 weeks now and are getting the best sleep we've ever had. We wake up earlier because we don't toss and turn and there is no pain. This mattress is thick and on the firm side but cradled your body so there are no pressure points. The free pillows are also perfect and we threw out our old expensive ones. If I could give 10 stars I would. LOVE this mattress!
customer_reviews.author: micah brown

customer_reviews.title: Expensive memory foam and box spring can suck it!!
customer_reviews.text: This this is freaking AWESOME. I have had box springs all my life and my girlfriend has a 4000$ memory foam bed. Fuc* springs and expensive memory foam. This thing rocks. So comfy and cool to sleep on . Also I have seen people post about the smell when you first unwrap if, I didn't have that issue. It was fine right out of the packaging. This is such a great deal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Mccartney

customer_reviews.title: It's been like this for over a year and finally breaking down ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for 2.5 years and ready for a new one already. This bed leaves pits where my husband and I lay and we are not heavy people. You can see the pits when the bed is freshly made even through the comforter. It's been like this for over a year and finally breaking down for a new one. I understand this isn't the most expensive mattress but it's in bad shape for its age. I've got back pain and it's just all around uncomfortable now due to the grooves.
customer_reviews.author: VbrachBsuTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Greatly reduced my back pain!
customer_reviews.text: We have been sleeping on this beautiful mattress for two months. It is the most comfortable mattress we have ever had AND it is in our RV. We have tried many types of mattresses over the years. Many have increased my back pain from spinal stenosis. None have held their shape and support with the difference in our weight. My husband weighs a hundred pounds more than I do. This mattress is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Have had this for 3 years and it is now ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for 3 years and it is now no longer flat on the top.. it has dips and hollows. I turn it end for end once a month but this has not stopped it from becoming somewhat uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: HarksGirl

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress after visiting the Mattress Firm, Ikea and the rest of the stores offering similar products. You just can't find a better deal than this mattress. I bought the King size Mattress and the support for it. Set up was easy, once unpacked, I let it stand and fill in. The next day we slept like we have been missing out on sleep! Thank you. Update! Here it is, 4 months later and we are still amazed by this mattress. It is great to sleep on, the mattress isn't sagging nor any other unpleasantness. Still happy to have made this choice!
customer_reviews.author: Doug2

customer_reviews.title: Good at first after a few years its bad
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2016..loved it at first but now 2020 it is KILLING our backs...I think it got to soft..In addition where we lay the mattress sags and there is a hump in the middle so disappointed . save your $$ 30 year warranty Really the warranty is no good if the manufacturer does not do anything about it. i think the manufacturer needs to do something to make it right.
customer_reviews.author: steve tourigny

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I just got it yesterday and got delivered on time. My first impression is good about the mattress and waiting for the full 72 hrs to make sure it gets to 12 inch. Now it is at 11 inch. It is not smelly as a lot of reviewers claimed, and I will keep update this review as I keep using it. I am giving it 4 stars just for now
customer_reviews.author: Hamadeeeno

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: I HAD chronic back pain prior to buying this mattress. Last night was my third night sleeping on my new mattress and I am waking almost pain free from prior nights on my old mattress. My back pain has subsided a great amount! If you are looking for a great mattress, this is the one! A wonderful investment at a reasonable price! It is also attractive looking. It does not look cheaply made. I am very happy with my purchase. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime T

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The smell eventually goes away. It took about a week. Move the box into the bedroom before you open it. I bought the 12” mattress and it’s a little too firm for me but not bad. At least I don’t sink into at night, creating a crater that I can’t roll out of like some mattresses do. The pillows are way too heavy and hard for me. Almost like resting your head on a block. The quality of fabric and stitching is great. Overall, I would recommend it. It has really held up nicely, I bought it a year ago. It’s a good value for the money and home delivery is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Rxshana

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a replacement for the original RV mattress that came in our fifth wheel. When this item arrived, the box was in bad shape, but luckily the mattress itself was welled wrapped in thick plastic and didn’t incur any damage. We’ve only had this for a few weeks, but so far it is very comfortable. It is very thick and slightly larger both in width and length compared to the original king size mattress that we had before. It makes getting on or around the bed more tight, but we don’t mind. I’m giving 4 stars, because we haven’t had it very long. If it holds up well, it will be a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Jill S.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this mattress.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second DynastyMattress Cool Breeze we've purchased. I purchased the first a year ago and it's holding up extremely well. Very comfortable, plus not having to deal with mattress salespeople made ordering via Amazon well worth the risk. We paired this with a Zinus Smartbase Mattress Frame and the setup took less than 15 minutes from delivery to placement in bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Third one
customer_reviews.text: These mattresses are really fabulous. It is a weird concept to get it in a box and then open it up and let it breathe for three days. Once they are opened they are quite heavy so you want them in the correct spot quickly. They are firm and feel great. This is my third one we purchased for different beds all from Amazon. They are a better price then going in a store and the mattress just makes my back feel so much better than a regular mattress. Also makes my pocketbook feel a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Andrews

customer_reviews.title: BEST MATTRESS EVER!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this nine months now. We call it our hotel bed. But actually, it is way better than even the best hotel bed. We both have extensive chiropractic issues, and I have severe sleep apnea. This mattress is a piece of heaven. Neither of us wake up with pain anymore. We both actually sleep. We go to bed and we sleep. It seems like an obvious thing. But for some of us, it's really not that easy. I can't believe the quality of this mattress for this price. It's just unreal. The two memory foam pillows that just came with it are of just such high quality, we bought two more.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn R. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Harder than the ground
customer_reviews.text: I've spent many a nights sleeping on the ground, and while they're not pleasant, they're preferable to this. I prefer a firm mattress, but this one might as well be made out of concrete. Believe it or not, the pillows are worse. I've never had any recurring body pain, until sleeping on this thing for a week; now I my shoulders, hips and neck are constantly sore. Return policy is garbage, so I guess I'm stuck with it. KEEP SHOPPING, DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Keebler

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress, Pillows Not So Much
customer_reviews.text: We put these mattresses on our bed and so far my back and leg pain hasn't been an issue in the mornings. It's the perfect balance of softness and firmness. The pillows are lacking with very little give and they are fat pushing my neck at the wrong angle for a side sleeper. I wish there was a way to remove some stuffing but they are a solid piece of memory foam, so I'll be giving them away to my son or sister. So, buy for the mattress, not the pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt last or live up to the reviews.
customer_reviews.text: After owning this bed for less than 2 years, I wake up with constant back pain. My wife and I both HATE this mattress. The bed feels great when you get into it but within an hour it loses all support and your hips sink so far in that your lower back has zero support. I'm 5'9 180lbs. This was the worst bed I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable mattress; does sag after ~8 months.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice mattress, quite firm. We bought this mattress just over a year ago. For the first 8 months or so, this was fantastic. However, the downside is that it' starting to sag (slight depressions in the place where one sleeps). With the exception of the sagging, it's really comfortable - i.e. if you don't mind being guided back into the most slept in position in the bed by the body depressions, it's a great mattress. Rotating and flipping the mattress didn't fix the sagging problem.
customer_reviews.author: CJBS

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable Mattress!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful mattress and a great price. I actually purchased it to replace a much more expensive sleep number bed. I would highly recommend this mattress to anyone looking for one. It is high quality, beautifully quilted, and very comfortable. It comes folded in half and rolled up very tight in plastic and when you remove the plastic it explodes open, and is very heavy to move, so I recommend you opening it on the box spring where you want it to be. It takes shape very quickly. I love mine!
customer_reviews.author: OSAS

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress because it was the correct size for an RV. It is a good quality foam mattress. I really can't say that there is good pain relief since my other foam mattresses were never painful either. I recommend this mattress and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Spokane Smith

customer_reviews.title: We own 3 of these mattresses, they are great..
customer_reviews.text: We purchased our first as a guest bedroom queen replacement mattress that got little use. Sleeping on it a few times we realized we like it much better than our spring mattress in our master so we bought a king for the master. It's cool and comfortable. My son just got a new full bed so we just replaced his with this one. They are great, no regrets. Setup is a snap and easily delivered. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chris A

customer_reviews.title: DynastyMattress Cool Breeze 12-Inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress, Queen comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Additionally 10/6/2020 about a few months ago I read many more recent reviews. Lots negative ones too before purchasing another mattress. Not good. I will not be purchasing any more of these. It sounds like product failure, mold..., material has been changed. ?Many dissatisfied customers. I recommend you read recent review that are negative before you decide. Dynasty Mattress. ynastyMattress Cool Breeze 12-Inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress, Queen, we liked it so much that we bought a 2nd one and am about to buy another for the guest rooms.
customer_reviews.author: CarLar

customer_reviews.title: Save your body and your pocketbook!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t care how it’s made or what it’s made of. I have had this mattress for 3 years now and would Not trade it for the world. I have bad back pains and once I purchased this mattress, 80% of them went away. Trust me you will get a good nights sleep and you won’t feel anyone next to you. And if you’re gonna make the switch. It’s easier to recover from $450 than $8000. Why pay for a name when you can just pay for the mattress!!!
customer_reviews.author: nairb74

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT this and have only slept on about 3 nights so far. We were very impressed. Can only hope it holds up. Bought as a replacement for our RV mattress. Is VERY FIRM but comfortable. We love firm! So far so good! I compared a bunch of beds on Amazon and decided on this one. Great delivery (even thou left in heavy rain by UPS, the box was soaked but the mattress was wrapped snug in plastic so no problems!)
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: very noticeable/problematic indentation after just 3 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in January 2014 and we're already considering a replacement due to very noticeable craters where my wife and I sleep. We're pretty average people (I'm 5'11" 200lbs) and we religiously rotate the bed every 6 months but now it's starting to give us a worse quality sleep having to toss and turn and waking up with occasional back stiffness. I'd say for the first year or year and a half it was fantastic and maybe this is an inherent issue with memory foam style beds (our first) but developing such problems only 3 years in means I can't recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W

customer_reviews.title: THis is the most comfortable bed I ever slept in
customer_reviews.text: THis is the most comfortable bed I ever slept in. Waited a few months to review and I haven’t noticed the memory foam becoming less dense or wearing out from use. It does stay pretty cool and I’m a really really hot sleeper. I’d say if you are looking for a bargain mattress this one is more than worth the price is sells for. I saw a lot of reviews talking about a smell from memory foam and mine didn’t have any sort of smell at all. This is a great mattress for under 500 dollars and I’d highly recommend it to anyone. Really great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: chris toombs

customer_reviews.title: it has been somewhat easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: For a change of mattress,coming from a spring mattress to a gel memory foam ,it has been somewhat easy to adjust.It has only been about 2 weeks since having this matress.It has only expanded to 11 inches and not the full 12 which is fine for me but it is a firm mattress and i do notice feeling more warmth then cool air,This mattress i would recommend for back sleepers,side sleepers be aware.Dont be fooled,this matress does have a scent,as told you should let it air out for a while,my smell is still ongoing but i hardly notice it now.The pillows are decent,i dont use them as much because it does hurt my neck and gives me headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Arif Deonarine

customer_reviews.title: Best Foam Mattress Ever. Period
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom after owning my own one for 2 years now. This is the best quality foam mattress on Amazon right now. We have had 0 complaints with it and it has not sunk, sagged at all. The foam density has held itself up perfectly and we havent had any areas on the mattress that have sunk in for use. I am 6 ft tall and 290 pounds (yes i am fat) and my side of the mattress is as good as the day i bought it. Spend the extra bucks and get this, you wont regret it. I would easily take this over the Ghost bed or Leesa or whatever those high marketed brands are.
customer_reviews.author: TechSavvyBuyerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mattress when our 9 year old tempurpedic finally gave out. The reviews were great so after much research and consideration I bought this one. It was dirt cheap so I was skeptical when it came but it seemed to live up to the reviews at first, good support and didn't make me hot like the tempurpedic. Fast forward 6 months and my 6' 200 lb husband is sleeping in a big body shaped hole and my self in a marginally smaller one. Lesson learned, back to the drawing board.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi 2020

customer_reviews.title: Good nuff
customer_reviews.text: I think all foam mattress can trap your body heat and make your back sweat. :( no matter what they say (some nights it does and some nights it doesnt). Im not in menopause but my body temp does rise when i sleep. As far as comfort and support: firm for 190# 5'6" and 190# 6'3". Had it for a few months in michigan winter season. More firm on side near the window (poss because its cooler). The thing came with the box beat up and falling off but plastic still sealed. Glad we kept it cuz its better with pressure relief than spring mattress...but not perfect. Good nuff
customer_reviews.author: honeybunny

customer_reviews.title: Buy this bed! No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed! It is so comfortable I'm not sure what some of the people were talking about being too hard it is like a cloud! Slept excellent first night no back pain! I'm a bigger person six three 280 it really is amazing. It's firm them you sink in super comfortable. I was skeptical about buying a bed online don't be like me but it today don't think about it for a couple weeks your only hurting yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivery & packaging are terrible.
customer_reviews.text: This item was supposed to come in a box & did NOT. The driver said that this is how they got it. I’m not sure if it’s been torn (see pic#3) & won’t know till I open it. Which I’m hesitant to do. When you spend hundreds of dollars for something you expect better service in delivery & packaging. I don’t think I’ll recommend this product/company to others. (I only put 1star for sleep/pain & comfort because I haven’t actually used it yet)
customer_reviews.author: Catherine R Mangino

customer_reviews.title: 20 year warrantee?  Yeah right!
customer_reviews.text: I would rate these mattresses a minus 2 if Amazon allowed it. We've had this mattress replaced multiple times and even paid more for supposedly the better 15 inch King model and it was like adding an extra layer of uselessness, it began breaking down within weeks to the point I had to buy an air pillow to try and keep it as level as possible. Don't even bother talking to them to deal with awful customer service, they will either not call you back or yell at you on the phone and accuse you of scamming, which I take complete offense to.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T.

customer_reviews.title: This bed is a magical oasis.
customer_reviews.text: Im writing this review whilst laying on my magical bed in which I purchased four years ago. Anyone who’s slept on it asks me what kind of bed it is. Purchasing a mattress online is tricky but I got really lucky with this one and would buy 100% buy another from this company. Im sure it’s softened up a slight after four years but still firm and supportive. I originally purchased this to replace an old tempur pedic that had lost its shape and was bowing in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Raffy

customer_reviews.title: RV King Mattress Works Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: We just installed this RV King mattress in our bus. We were concerned that after having our sleep number bed at home it would be tough to adjust our sleeping comfort. My husband said he slept like a rock. I did fine but will adjust over the next few nights. We are very impressed with the mattress. Easy to put in the RV, much easier to make the bed (RV king is 4” less than reg), and there was no odor with a new mattress. We would recommend this mattress for anyone looking to replace their mattress in their RV!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney L. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Omg love this upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Omg love this upgrade! No problems with expansion! Well worth the money! We cannot feel each other move around and our grand baby sleeps with us! My coach has great heat and AC and we have no complaints of mattress being too hot... I want one for home! My only issue was me.... got the 12 inch and the way the slide is mattress fits perfect when we close it.... but I never considered extra blankets/bed being made when closing and a taller mattress did decrease walk around room..... suggestion is to think about that when determining thickness
customer_reviews.author: Christina Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what happened...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a Dynasty King mattress 3 1/2 years ago and have loved it every day since. Got the queen size for our shore house, and my fiancee and I both agree it's much softer than the king. Not sure if it's bad luck or quality has gone down. : - ( Not terrible, just that Dynasty set the bar high the first time and didn't meet it this time around.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Carri

customer_reviews.title: Best Mattress, Best Price
customer_reviews.text: Greatest mattress I have ever had. I am a large person, 300 lbs. Most mattresses are just not up to the task. Prior to this mattress, I would wake up with an aching lower back every morning. The first night on this that problem stopped. I have two of these now for over a year, and they are holding up as though they are new. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: ishootfriendlies

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best mattress that I have ever had. I'm around 370 and this mattress is really firm. I always thought I would hate a firm mattress but I sleep so much better on this than anything else. Love the fact that the edge doesn't "roll" when you sleep near the sides. Makes the mattress seem bigger than it really is. Best price of any brand that I could find. I research for a few weeks before taking the plunge and I am super pleased. It's a shame I can only give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Drunk Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: This mattress fit perfectly. It is just as comfortable as advertised (although the pillows are weird). Be sure to put in on the platform in your RV before you take off the plastic. It will be REALLY hard to move after it expands. Most of the expansion happens in < 5 min. Takes about a week for the slight smell to subside. Absolutely NO complaints. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vetabandit

customer_reviews.title: Soooo comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is GREAT! We started using it the day we got it because it started filling out quickly. I read the reviews and did some in-store and online comparisons and decided on this one and am not disappointed! The first time I laid on the bed, my initial thought was it would be a bit firm for my liking but that thought lasted for a couple of minutes at most. This is by far the most comfortable mattress I've had. Reading the reviews, I was slightly worried about the "smell" that some had experienced. I didn't have that problem. I'll be purchasing this mattress for my children though. Definitely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: mmace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mattress for this couple... finally one we both love.
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for about 2 months now and the mattress is amazing. Medium firm. I am a big guy at 6ft 6 and 299 lbs.... this mattress is the only one we have owned that has held up my weight and pretty much solved my wife’s back issues. Finally a mattress we both can use. For my wife, it’s a god send as she was nearly crippled from back pain from our other mattress purchases for crap that was double the price of this bed. Great price. Excellent quality. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Ott

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable affordable mattress
customer_reviews.text: We have had this matress for a year now. We love it. So comfortable. Not too firm and not too soft. We put 2 by 4s underneath the matress as recommended by a post. No sagging at all and no.turning of the mattress. Would definitely recommend for the price. Update: we have now had this mattress for 4 years now. Absolutely love it. It has kept its shape. Just as comfortable now as it was when we first got it. Would highly recommend. Sleep very well.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: First night
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this mattress midday on a Wednesday and received it Friday afternoon! So shipping was extremely fast- we used standard. There is somewhat of a smell- it almost smells like a light chocolate? Not something really strong or like chemicals, I’m sure it will air out. It was extremely easy to get it out of the bag and it set up quickly. It’s only been a couple hours and it looks to already be set up and it’s really comfortable! My husband and I are both very satisfied so far and hope this bed stays this way and lasts! I will update this review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Haley C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress at A Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I tried Casper and Nectar and got a huge disappointment! Neither of the high priced mattresses were what the are hyped up to be. They never expanded and were very uncomfortable. I was a believer in you get what you pay for. This time I was wrong. After 2 failed attempts. I decided to try Dynasty. BEST decision ever! I LOVE IT! It is better than described.
customer_reviews.author: Leighbird

customer_reviews.title: It's horrible. Have to buy a different mattress
customer_reviews.text: Had this mattress just over 3 years. It's horrible. Have to buy a different mattress. It's so stiff and firm that I wake up with a back ache every morning that quickly dissipates until I sleep on it again. My joints hurt, my husband's back hurts, and both of us are so hot on this mattress. I usually sleep cool but I am sweating. This mattress retains heat. Don't believe the cool gel nonsense.
customer_reviews.author: Renee D Boles

customer_reviews.title: Great...at first. Then sags after just a few months
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. We bought this mattress in February, 2017. We were very happy with it for the first 4 months but then noticed it was starting to have indents where we slept. They became worse and worse and now my husband is having back problems. 30 year warranty my ass. We didn't even get a year out of it. I have no idea how to contact the manufacturer to warranty our mattress. I probably wouldn't bother. Just get yourselves a Serta or something because at least you can use the warranty. We will be getting rid of it as soon as we can afford a good mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Francismommyof3

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY BED!
customer_reviews.text: i am a large man and finding a mattress to hold up without spending many hundreds of dollars was difficult....however, a friend recommended this mattress to me and even invited me to take a nap on hers....that nap lasted over three hours....i don't think i moved the whole time....i ordered one almost two years and could not be happier...i put it on top of a conventional box spring and it has not sagged in the center one bit....love love love...
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: and horrible sex life
customer_reviews.text: Alleluya🙏🏽 to the makers of this mattress. I never thought that paying way way less for a mattress online vs mattress land would've been the solution to my back pain, and horrible sex life. My back doesn't hurt anymore which leads to awesome sex attitudes😂😇 with my husband of course.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Second one we’ve bought
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Dynasty mattress. We still have the original and love it This one was purchased for our guest bedroom for our new home. These are great mattresses. Super comfortable. You’ll read reviews that complain about the smell, but it is to be expected from a memory foam product/material. The smell isn’t bad and it goes away within a few days. Definitely suggest the recommended metal bases. Our preference is the 15.5inch premier cool breeze, but the medium firmness is comfortable as well....definitely personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: but it is easy to lay out
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is very heavy, but it is easy to lay out. Comes in a roll and you lay it on your frame, un roll it and it expands. It takes about a day to expand. It was a little too stiff for my liking, but I have added a foam mattress pad to help soften it. I would have returned it, but you have to pay for shipping, and that would have been costly. I love that it came with 2 pillows, and the mattress itself it very beautiful. Would buy from this company again, just maybe a thicky softer mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Crews Family

customer_reviews.title: Headaches, backpain, soaked sheets = REGRETS
customer_reviews.text: Omg this mattress is so messed up, so so messed up. Me and my husband have to sleep LITERALLY huddled in a corner of the bed because there are so many holes and issues with the foam. The bed is so hot like laying on a plastic bag. I am so dissatisfied with this deal. I loved this bed at first but now after 2 years i wish i had spent a couple hundred more and got a quality mattress. All these headaches, all this back pain, all these sweat soaked sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Tuesdaystwin

customer_reviews.title: so the warranty is useless this way
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be firm after reading the comments but it is NOT firm. It is medium to soft and with 2 herniated discs I cannot sleep on it. Unfortunately, it's impossible to return after it expands because you cannot fit it in the original box as requested for returns, so the warranty is useless this way.
customer_reviews.author: Anna P

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable in any size!
customer_reviews.text: We were a bit hesitant to buy a mattress out of a box and through the mail without seeing or trying it before purchasing. Once it arrived, I knew we made the right decision. This is mattress is VERY comfortable and a good deal for the cost. We bought the queen for our travel trailer and a few months later we bought the king for our master bedroom. Shipping was super speedy!! Thank you!!'
customer_reviews.author: Grey Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is our first foam mattress and we are extremely pleased. Coming from a innerspring mattress it took a little getting used to but nothing bad. I do sleep HOT and I have had no problems with heat build up. Although it is winter right now. Mattress is firm. We bought a quilted topper here at Amazon that I think helps out a lot. After 2 weeks, my back feels better and I sleep more soundly. We are going to purchase these for the kids too.
customer_reviews.author: jerryb

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, owned for two years. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: The bed gets shipped to your door in a tight roll. The thing is pretty heavy which is good. You have to let it air out for a day or two because it’s vaccum sealed and smells kind of funny. **ive owned this bed for two years!!! It’s great, no signs of sagging or body formation, gets slightly softer all over after 6 months. Everyone is amazed at how comfortable it is!! Would recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stinks but is comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this mattress. But unlike my last memory foam mattress the smell has not faded in almost two months. Firmness is just right for me. Coolness? Well it doesn't feel any cooler then my last memory foam mattresss so I'm not sure if this is pure marketing or what.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nowak

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this bed. It seems to breathe well.... There is a smell but it's not bad, and I'm sure it will slowly dwindle away. I never notice it unless I put my nose directly to it..... The only complaint I have us the cover... We washed it when we first got it and the rope wrapped around it is somewhat frayed, not horrible, and not noticeable with the sheets on. But the rope profile is shown through the sheets which again I don't like. It's just unnecessary.... But it's not a huge deal and this bed is very comfortable and we get great sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: From this experience I've learned that what people consider comfortable can vary significantly from person to person
customer_reviews.text: This purchase turned into a giant rigamarole. After three months of use the mattress started developing groves where we slept. I contacted Amazon and ended up returning it and getting a new one. The new one has springs and foam, and so far is holding up well. The lesson learned here is to test the mattress before ordering. From this experience I've learned that what people consider comfortable can vary significantly from person to person. My next purchase I will go to a store instead, regardless of how much you can save by ordering online. Sleep is definitely something you should invest in, not cut corners.
customer_reviews.author: Eloy Campos

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: I set it up about 4 months ago, waited 24 hours before using it and I've loved it ever since I started sleeping on this mattress. My only problem is not buying this sooner... Best mattress ever. Also when it arrived I was missing one of the pillows and without question they sent me another immediately. I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: BetterAge

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mattress
customer_reviews.text: The queen size mattress was delivered very fast and is exceptionally soft. We have a $2000 Serta mattress and this one is just as good if not better. This mattress was purchased for our daughter. We will soon order another for our son.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Y.

customer_reviews.title: full size bed
customer_reviews.text: read all the reviews, wasn't as firm as i was expecting from what i read, but i'm a heavy person 5'4", 265lbs so it's probably me. it has been outgassing for the 8 days i've had it, not horrible, but strong! it's very heavy as a mattress, do put it on the box spring before opening the plastic cover! also it comes rolled up- upside down so be prepared to flip it. it puffed to full size in seconds! Wonder why they say 72 hrs? seems to relieve pressure point pain, but i'd like my bottom more supported as it sinks in too far. this bed probably isn't the best for the very heavy person.
customer_reviews.author: carol wright

customer_reviews.title: Must be allowed at least a couple of weeks to air out.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking mattresses In the beginning the mattress was very soft but it firms up substantially in a couple weeks. The mattress smells very bad at first. Left in the garage for a couple of weeks. Still smells after 3-4 weeks but not as bad. Pillows too but very comfortable pillows. They don’t smell any more.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Quattrin

customer_reviews.title: Mattress is comfortable & affordable
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress! I had kept my old one for a bit too long as I am sure we all do, but this was recommended to me by my parents. I was a bit skeptical, but I went ahead with the purchase. The only complaint I have after 2 weeks sleeping on it is that upon opening I couldn't automatically put it down and use it. There is a 48 hr "inflation" period before recommended use! Either way this is the best mattress I have ever used (coil, memory foam or otherwise)!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Virtue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Been sleeping on it for a year and it's one of the best mattresses I've owned. Especially for the price. I've owned mattresses that cost almost $2k and I didn't sleep as well as I do on this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Graff

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfort for the Price But Concerned.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this exact model because I stayed at my friend's house who had this exact mattress. It was an amazingly comfortable bed. We just got it today and opened it. It is absolutely beautiful material BUT the smell from whatever it is made of is overwhelming. I am concerned about what type of chemical it is and if it is harmful to our health. It smells like formaldehyde which I am praying it is not because it is carcinogenic. I want a comfortable bed but not cancer. Hoping to get a reply from the seller. I just want to make sure whatever they have on this is not going to harm my health.
customer_reviews.author: Koreyah L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality, firm, affordable memory foam mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a firm mattress to help my wife and I with our back problems. This mattress has delivered. Quality: We've only had it for 3 weeks so I'm not sure how well it will hold up in the long term. However, everything so far has been perfect. It expanded to the right shape and size. It's flat, no lumps, smells fine. Firm: No more waking up with sore backs. I'd call it "quite firm." Maybe a 7 of 10 on the firmness scale. Affordable: Costs a fraction of what you'd pay for a memory foam mattress in stores. If it weren't for this good price I would not have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: 6 Month Review
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the California King mattress at the beginning of 2016 and I have to say that this is the best purchase we have ever made. The mattress doesn't sleep too hot or cold (in Oregon) and it is the perfect firmness for my Husband's back issues. It is also showing no signs of wear via indentations or creases and the mattress protector still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It’s Growing on Me
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our camper; bought the regular queen size; it fits in our camper like a glove, but that’s not a good thing. This mattress is very dense and heavy, so because it fits so tightly it is a pain in the a$$ to change the sheets. It is very firm but we’re getting used to it. There was a chemical smell when we first opened it; I now only smell it when I’m changing the sheets, we don’t smell it when we’re sleeping. I wish we would have ordered the RV queen size and I have no idea how we would ever get it out of the camper if we wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress, great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant to purchase over the Internet, but you can't beat no tax & free shipping. I'm glad we took the chance. It comes rolled up and vacuum packed - it's heavy, but with 2 people easy to move up our stairs. It took a couple nights to get used to the difference of foam vs innerspring, but my back doesn't hurt anymore. If there was anything I could say I don't care for is that it's easy to get hot on this mattress, but I'm hot natured.
customer_reviews.author: Holly N

customer_reviews.title: Firm mattress is just what my back needed
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this mattress now for about 2 months and we really like it. It is definately FIRM. There has been a little bit of softening with the breaking in period but not much. We did encounter the smell that so many people have complained about. Very strong at first but it gradually gets better. It took at least 3 weeks to go away completely. So far happy with the purchase though. I will update if that changes.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye_Couple

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan, to firm. Holds up well after three years though.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not positive why I don't like the bed, but after three years of complaining about it, I thought I'd look for a new one and write a review saying so. I purchased two in May 2014, and both have held up well, this there stars. I personally think the bed is too firm, you don't really suck into it. Honestly, it's hard to believe it's memory foam at times. I'm sure others will love it, but I prefer something softer.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Williams

customer_reviews.title: Firmer than expected.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this mattress for a little over a year now and it has held up very well. It's still firmer than I thought it would be. It was VERY firm at purchase and that hasn't changed much. It does have a little more give to It but it's not softer. Honestly, I don't believe the "cool" technology it boasts is any different than any other mattress but none the less, it's very comfortable and hasn't given us any issues. I will look for something that comes a little less firm next time but for the price, it's a fantastic purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Really absorbs sound if you know what I mean. 10/10 my girlfriend loved it. Until she broke up with me so now the bed is riddled with her memory. Still sleeps well. I’m just sad. Thank you for a great product though
customer_reviews.author: caleb

customer_reviews.title: Love this mattress
customer_reviews.text: This was the first thing my husband and I bought for our RV. The way it was delivered made it easy to get inside. It’s so comfortable. I suggest this to everyone not just RV owners. The product is high quality and the price makes it even better.
customer_reviews.author: The Bowmans

customer_reviews.title: It's firm, It smells, but there is hope
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought this bed, I was like Holy *&$! The bed smells like a chemical factory, and is hard as a rock. I slept pretty good from day one. It is not magic, I slept the exact same way on my other bed. It has been a few weeks now and it is getting better. The smell and the firmness is decreasing, making it a wonderful bed. You simply cannot beat the price. It feels like the high dollar ones I tried at the store. I would highly recommend having some "fun" in this bed. It seems to help with softening up the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: shaunbask

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, Really helped with my wife's back pain!
customer_reviews.text: Love the mattress. Like the pillows although the are way too small. The mattress we purchased is a RV king but the pillows they sent with it wont even fill up half of a king pillow case. I was able to fit both pillows into a single king size pillow case. Other than that we are extremely satisfied with the comfort of the mattress. We have a Tempurpedic cloud at home and I would say that this mattress compares very well to it, And it cost a whole lot less!
customer_reviews.author: Les Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Best bed I ever slept on!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it was just because we were sleeping a smaller spring bed that was on the floor or if its because angels actually stitched this bed together. SERIOUSLY!!!! This bed is SOOOOO comfortable its the perfect combination between firm and soft. it really is like floating on a cloud. Plus it come with two pillows that are awesome as well. We got some memory foam pillows at Walmart with gel for $12 each and they aren't half as good as the pillows that this bed come with. i really can't comprehended how this has bad reviews at all. The only bad thing about this bed is you never wanna get out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Sadly I think it may be better than my 1800+ Serta in my house
customer_reviews.text: I got this mattress for 350ish for my camper. Sadly I think it may be better than my 1800+ Serta in my house. Never ordered a mattress online because I’ve always had to try one out before purchase but I was lot disappointed. The reviews made me bite the bullet and buy one and now I have no regrets. I look forward to sleeping comfortably on camping trips
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: From Rock Hard to Soft Pockets, It's a Loser
customer_reviews.text: I've now had this bed for 3 years. The 1st year it was rock hard and we had to add a 3" foam topper to be able to sleep on it. Now it's too soft and has huge indentations and pockets that sag. Our backs are killing us and we are now looking for a new bed. Do yourself a favor just pass on this: others say there is no customer service, so forget the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Firm but like sleeping on a cloud of softens.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mattress we have every owned. We have had many many mattresses in our 21 years of marriage. We have owned it since Feb. 2020 This is the most comfortable mattress ever. It's like sleeping on a cloud every night but is very supportive. This mattress has been the best mattress for my back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have not slept on it but purchased it based on previous mattresses I have bought from them. It will be used in the guest bedroom where my mom, who suffers from scoliosis, will sleep when she visits. The mattress gives to your bone structure, preventing pressure points that cause discomfort to the bones. She slept on one of the mattresses I purchased years ago for one of my sons. Loved it so much we got her one for her home. Only complaint I have right now is that it didn’t come with the advertised foam pillows. I emailed the company through Amazon but have received no reply after 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: tricia Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I have never had a more comfortable bed than this
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have never had a more comfortable bed than this! We bought a pillow top to go along with it and it was the perfect "icing on the cake"! We have had an incredible nights rest for the last 2 weeks and cannot say enough great things about it! My husband really loves the pillows, I can't use a pillow like that because of neck and back issues (I use a contour style pillow.)
customer_reviews.author: Aguiar Family

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Transaction!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress has been a lifesaver for me after 4 major back surgeries! Arrived a day early and took my husband and a friend to bring it back to the bedroom and place on bed. We slept on it the first night! It replaced the high-end trendy mattress that barely lasted10 yrs and cost 3 times as much. Very comfortable, cool sleeping! The pillows are great, too! An excellent transaction!
customer_reviews.author: Jan E L

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up over time.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this when I first bought it, about four years ago. It was very firm and felt great to sleep on. Now however, it's lost a lot of its firmness. I sink in what I feel is far too much. It's gotten too plush and leaves me sore and achey when I wake up. Would not recommend at all if you're like me and need an extra firm mattress due to back problems.
customer_reviews.author: Six

customer_reviews.title: Quality and firmness
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal for a really good mattress. We purchased for our room at a Son's house and was very surprised at the quality of the product since this King mattress cost around 400 dollars. It's medium firm to firm(which we wanted). No one i found on line comes close to this mattress for quality and price. I've already recommended to Family members and i'm plan on buying more for guest rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Hard and uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: If I could have afforded to return it, I would have. My husband and I bought this well-rated mattress for our RV. We have slept on it for 4 months as we are snowbirds. It is the hardest, most uncomfortable mattress we have ever slept on. You can't roll over without using your elbows to push up on. We're stuck with it now as replacing it is not an option. Does anyone know if it can be taken apart to adjust the height and rigidity? We have to use stepstools to get in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Gail C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for both of us!
customer_reviews.text: Box was really beat up, not manufactures fault but just be prepared, the mattress was pretty easy for just my husband to carry upstairs and put on the frame. Bed unrolled in 30 seconds, then "fluffed" visibly in about a minute. We gave it the full 721 hours before sleeping on it and I LOVE it! I have had back problems for years and now I can sleep without tossing and turning. I also don't need to see the chiropractor as often. My husband used to drop sweat when he slept and would smell grossly in the morning but now sleeps cool and comfortable! I approve ;)
customer_reviews.author: Kaddie

customer_reviews.title: A great Mattress+ A great  Frame= Great Sleep
customer_reviews.text: Once that I allowed the mattress to take that giant inhale everything was fine , I have read other reviews and comments that there were no marks or stains on the mattress that I received . To protect my investment I covered the mattress with a waterproof cover, All that was left to do was to place the mattress on my adjustable frame . I had a great first weeks sleep and I am looking to many more.
customer_reviews.author: MEC

customer_reviews.title: So glad we sprung for this
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous about ordering a mattress online without laying on it first, but this one is awesome. I like a firm bed because I'm a tummy sleeper, but my husband likes a soft bed because he sleeps on his back -- memory foam was a great compromise. It's firm and soft at the same time. The fact that one person can toss and turn all night and not wake the other person up is also great. The price for a King is also awesome -- you couldn't find this price at a mattress store.
customer_reviews.author: Norah

customer_reviews.title: Love this more than I can possible tell you
customer_reviews.text: Love this more than I can possible tell you, and every night we love it more. We've had it for 3 weeks now, and I now dread going up to the cabin to sleep on the $3000 stearns and foster set up that this replaced. I know it's a risk, but for this price, pull the trigger! We did notice a little smell when we opened it, but it was subtle and my wife actually liked it. Also, I HATE being hot when I sleep, and this matress is not an issue. Not any hotter than an inner spring mattress. Buy with confidence, you won't regret it. it is firm, but not hard, and it gets better every night!
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Comfortably firm after 17 months so far.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortably firm. Used for about 17 months so far. My back requires a firm mattress and this works great. However, I spend a few nights per week at my girlfriend's place, so it is getting less wear. Quite happy with it after replacing a very soft mattress with this. Girlfriend's mattress was $2k and is too soft so I'm trying to convince her to get one as well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Snider

customer_reviews.title: Bought this in a king size for a temporary 6-month ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in a king size for a temporary 6-month work relocation. Mattress was delivered to building, unwrapped in room and slept on it that night. No weird or funky odors. Filled up immediately. My husband was skeptical at first and now raves how he loves this mattress more than the $2000 Sterns & Foster we have back at home. The price can't be beat. I'm also a tosser through the night and this mattress absorbs all my moves and doesn't disturb the mister at all.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S

customer_reviews.title: Great nights sleep
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Dynasty bed. We had one in NY and left it there when we moved to MN. I couldn't wait to get another one. My hisband is able to get out of bed at 3:30 am and not wake me from motion. If you lay in the same spot and don't move for like 5 minutes the bed sort of hugs you and cradles you. We purchased a king and seem to have trouble finding king sheets that fit it right. Mainly the fitted sheet. Other than that there aren't any downfalls of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Herringmommy

customer_reviews.title: Has an odor
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable mattress, but it still stinks a month later. We bought a king size for our RV. Make sure you have it in place ( not upside down and not sideways) if getting it for an RV. It expands super fast when you unwrap it and it’s almost impossible to flip over or rotate it due to tiny RV bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: KG

product_meta.title: DynastyMattress New Cool Breeze 12-Inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress (Twin XL)
feature_bullets: 3" Gel Foam! Sleep Cool Technology Memory Foam!
9" State of the Art cool airflow foam support base layer!
Made with High Quality and durable 2-layer construction! 120 day trial
Luxurious white cover with brown suede on corners, fire barrier, zipper washable cover!
FREE 1 Gel Memory Foam Pillow! 30 years Limited Warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars3,122 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
